bill.title: Relating to securities regulation; prescribing an effective date.
bill.description: Updates, clarifies and modernizes provisions of the Oregon Securities Law and related statutes. Updates, clarifies and modernizes provisions of the Oregon Securities Law and related statutes. Takes effect on the 91st day following adjournment sine die.
